section.title: Assess Finance Charges
section.para: To calculate and apply Finance Charges, select the "Assess Finance Charges" option. The following screen will appear:
When assessing Finance Charges, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Use the drop-down options to select All Customers or one of the following filters:
Choose this option to select a single Customer. Enter the Customer number.
Select this option if you only want to assess Finance Charges for a single Customer Group. Select the Customer Group from the drop-down list that will be available once this option is selected.
Select this option if you only want to assess Finance Charges for a single Customer Type. Select the Customer Type from the drop-down list that will be available once this option is selected.
When selecting this option, you are able to filter on customers that belong to the Customer Type(s) that correspond to the characters you type in the adjacent text box. The entry is case sensitive.
The assessment date defaults to the current date, but it is possible to enter a past or future date that will be used for the calculation.

varlistentry.term: Select Invoices for Finance Charge assessment

listitem.para: Overdue Invoices for selected Customers will be displayed. Select the invoices on which Finance Charges should be assessed.

section.para: The following button is unique to this screen:

listitem.para: Click this button to calculate Finance Charges on the selected Invoices.
